One more thing, I think that for some losses (like MSELoss, L1Loss and others) we should allow the target to require gradient, so that we can backprop through it.
This is not a big issue because those losses are easy to reimplement in one line, still would be a good thing to have I think.

body:
One more thing, I think that for some losses (like `MSELoss`, `L1Loss` and others) we should allow the target to require gradient, so that we can backprop through it.
This is not a big issue because those losses are easy to reimplement in one line, still would be a good thing to have I think.
